actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Health Professions Educational Assistance Act of 1976 to afford preferential status to alien physicians and surgeons in admission to the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Health Professions Educational Assistance Act of 1976 to repeal the Congressional finding that there is a sufficient number of physicians and surgeons in the United States and that there is no further need to afford preference to alien physicians and surgeons in admission to the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Health Professions Educational Assistance Act of 1976 to afford preferential status to alien physicians and surgeons in admission to the United States.
